name: Galloping Ghost Arcade Expansion Project
blurb: The largest and one of the most popular arcades is expanding!  More games and events help us bring you the ultimate gaming utopia!

rewards.reward: Any donations of $5 and up will receive access to the "Behind the Scenes" website. Access to the site will let you in on all of the progress as it happens. You will see all of the new games we will be adding, track the progress of the build out, see behind the scenes pictures, and you'll have access to the information before anyone else.
A donation of $10 will get you an 8x10 poster signed by as many video game industry celebrities as we can get to sign it.

All contributors that donate $25 or more will be invited to the exclusive Sharp Dressed Expansion Event held at the Galloping Ghost Arcade. \r\nThis event will celebrate the expansion of the Galloping Ghost and launch all of the goals we have accomplished up to that point. \r\nWe hope everyone will be able to join us for this spectacular night of video gaming history.

For your $35 donation, you can choose a game to add to the collection for one of our consoles or PC. We would like to have an extensive collection for the upcoming PC room and console room, showcasing all of the systems and games that have made video gaming so iconic.
For a donation of $40, you will get a Week Pass to Galloping Ghost Arcade. \r\nYou can come in for a whole week at no charge.

Your $50 donation gets you an exclusive Galloping Ghost Arcade T-shirt. Never before sold at the arcade, these shirts were specially designed for the expansion fundraiser.\r\nhttp://www.gallopingghostarcade.com/fundraiser/incentives/one_of_us.html
For your donation of $60, you will receive a full size Galloping Ghost Arcade poster featuring signatures of various video game celebrities and the Galloping Ghost staff.
For your donation of $90, you will receive a Month Pass to Galloping Ghost Arcade. \r\nThis pass allows you to come to the Arcade 31 days in a row at no charge.

Your $100 donation gets you an exclusive Galloping Ghost Arcade Hoodie. Never before sold at the arcade, these hoodies feature a full back Galloping Ghost Arcade logo and certificate of authenticity.\r\nhttp://www.gallopingghostarcade.com/fundraiser/incentives/gga_represent.html

For your donation of $250, you will be treated to a day of gaming with a Pro Gamer / World Record holder of your choice. Your package will include free entry to Galloping Ghost Arcade, a pizza lunch, and a day of gaming with your selected gamer. You and your gamer will have full access to the arcade floor and party gaming room wherein you can learn to perfect your skills on any of our over 400 titles or just have a relaxing day of casual gaming with your Pro Gamer.
For a donation of $300, you are invited to have lunch with a gaming celebrity. \r\nWe will be posting a list of the celebrities soon.
For your donation of $375, you will receive a Year Pass to Galloping Ghost Arcade. \r\nThis pass allows you to come to the Arcade 365 days in a row at no charge.

For a donation of $400, you will be able to take place as one of our first students for the gaming education aspect of the arcade. You will be able to film in front of the green screen and put yourself into a game that you design. We will help you through the production process and show you how to make your game playable.
For your donation of $500, you may choose an arcade cabinet that will be added to the arcade floor for everyone to enjoy.\r\nSome limitations apply.

For a donation of $800, you can receive a custom made arcade stick for the platform of your choice. Galloping Ghost Arcade will work with you on the design process: how do you want our stick to look, what buttons should we use, what system is it for, etc...
For your $2000 donation, you can select a pinball machine for our soon to be renovated pinball room.
For your donation of $2500, you will receive a Decade Pass to Galloping Ghost Arcade. This pass will give you access to the arcade every day for the next 10 years.

For your donation of $5000, Galloping Ghost Arcade will custom make you an arcade cabinet with a game of your choice. The design of your cabinet can vary on what type you want and how creative you want to be.
